subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Tony Kanaan, racing in his 12th Indy 500, secured his first win in the race when he passed Ryan Hunter-Reay with three laps to go and Dario Franchitti crashed a lap later.
snippet: Tony Kanaan, racing in his 12th Indy 500, secured his first win in the race when he passed Ryan Hunter-Reay with three laps to go and Dario Franchitti crashed a lap later.
